signal_1_scientific_novelty.resonance_density: Domain bridging (medicinal chemistry → agriculture), unexplored chemical space

signal_2_market_urgency.key_insight: ST53 strain in Mallorca (Apulia disaster precedent), 1,566+ samples, 80% almond devastation, NO CURE EXISTS

signal_3_partner_readiness.key_insight: UIB-IFISC GRAPHIB project active until 2027, farmer network engaged, vector control + cure synergy

signal_4_funding_opportunity.key_insight: €6M XYL-PHOS-CURE + €12.5M AgData (late Nov) + €17.5M EIC = €36M total addressable

from_documentation.our_advantage: Only systemic curative chemistry in EU pipeline

signal_5_competitive_threat.key_insight: Zero phosphinate competitors, BeXyl/GRAPHIB complementary (not competitive), 18-24 month IP window

signal_6_climate_expansion.key_insight: 2050 projections show WORSENING spread, Extremadura 300K hectares NEW, €1B+ long-term market

parallel_funding_tracks.implication: Not betting on single grant, multi-track platform strategy
